channel.title: Urgent help needed, errors, help etc! please!
channel.description:
1
.\server\players\client.java:7152: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PutNPCCords location: class server.players.client PutNPCCords = true; ^ Note: .\server\server.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
it saying that when i tried adding shop :$ Help please Thanks 2 I'm usin 317 deob, and QP: isn't showing, what to i edit to put that in? 3. Magic shortbow specials ! Help please lol using Devo 2.7 :p

item.title: Urgent help needed, errors, help etc! please!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“redrover, post:7, topic:300970”][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=397247.msg2949925#msg2949925 date=1252441432]

It says cannot find symbol…could it be that you are missing some { } around the code? Does your entry look something like this?

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop
	PutNPCCoords = true;
             WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop

Read what he writed, He writed PutNPCCords = true; Instead of PutNPCCoords = true;

/Allstarscapeleechmuch?

Anyways, try making npccoords = false, or try what they said.
I don’t want you to ruin the server before I even get to see it. XP
[/quote]

Wtf is allstarscape?

Oh, And he probally won’t ruin the server with that, He just mistyped it :)[/quote]

Offtopiccontinuation: } else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop
That shop is from allstarscape source, which is a leech from project czar…
And I hope you’re right that he only mistyped it. I worked on the client for this project for hours. :x

Read full topic
item.source: Urgent help needed, errors, help etc! please!
